pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This library lets you derive automatically Haskell functions that let you query each endpoint of a <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/servant servant> webservice.
See <http://docs.servant.dev/en/stable/tutorial/Client.html the client section of the tutorial>.
<https://github.com/haskell-servant/servant/blob/master/servant-client/CHANGELOG.md CHANGELOG>
